titleStmt.title: The antiquity of the Protestant religion with an answer to Mr. Sclater's reasons, and the collections made by the author of the pamphlet entitled Nubes Testium : in a letter to a person of quality : the first part.
titleStmt.author: Pelling, Edward, d. 1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ben. Griffin, and are to be sold by Randal Taylor...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Pelling. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
